title: __init__
content:
# `prefect.client` Asynchronous client implementation for communicating with the [Prefect REST API](https://docs.prefect.io/v3/api-ref/rest-api/). Explore the client by communicating with an in-memory webserver - no setup required: \
``` $ # start python REPL with native await functionality $ python -m asyncio from prefect.client.orchestration import get_client async with get_client() as client: response = await client.hello() print(response.json()) ðŸ‘‹ ``` \
